mitre_attack_techniques.signature_description: Executes commands using a shell command-line interpreter
Executes the "systemctl" command used for controlling the systemd system and service manager

ids_alerts.rule_msg: ET SCAN Potential SSH Scan OUTBOUND
ids_alerts.rule_raw: alert tcp $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET 22 (msg:"ET SCAN Potential SSH Scan OUTBOUND"; flow:to_server; flags:S,12; threshold: type threshold, track by_src, count 5, seconds 120; reference:url,en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brute_force_attack; classtype:attempted-recon; sid:2003068; rev:7; metadata:created_at 2010_07_30, confidence Medium, signature_severity Informational, updated_at 2019_07_26;)

ids_alerts.rule_msg: ET INFO Observed DNS Query to .cfd TLD
ids_alerts.rule_raw: alert dns $HOME_NET any -> any any (msg:"ET INFO Observed DNS Query to .cfd TLD"; dns.query; dotprefix; content:".cfd"; nocase; endswith; fast_pattern; classtype:misc-activity; sid:2065867; rev:1; metadata:attack_target Client_Endpoint, tls_state plaintext, created_at 2025_11_20, deployment Perimeter, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, tag Description_Generated_By_Proofpoint_Nexus, updated_at 2025_11_20; target:src_ip;)

signature_matches.description: Executes commands using a shell command-line interpreter
Executes the "systemctl" command used for controlling the systemd system and service manager
All domains contacted by the sample do not resolve. The sample is likely an old dropper which does no longer work.
Sample tries to kill a process (SIGKILL)
Sample contains strings indicative of BusyBox which embeds multiple Unix commands in a single executable
